text: @realDonaldTrump Psst, #BunkerBoy, do you know there's a plague raging with #TrumpDeathToll128K? Just in case that got lost along with details on #BountyGate. Don't you hate it when you try to open the PDB & your crayons fall all over the floor? #sippycup #coronavirus #TrumpIsALoser
